author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent - and it's YOUR support that makes shows like this possible. Join us at: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

The DF Retro Super Show returns once again, with John Linneman joined by friends and colleagues Audi Sorlie, Coury Carlson and Marc 'Try4ce' Duddleson. As the year draws to a close, the panel look back at their favourite retro bits of the year, covering old games they finally discovered along with new, retro-themed releases... and much more!

Visit the NEW Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 - Introduction
03:00 - News 1: EGM Documentary
12:01 - News 2: Funtastic Analogue 3D
18:03 - News 3: Skyrim on Switch 2
22:11 - Our Year in Retro 2025: Retro Games we played for the first time
48:43 - Our Year in Retro 2025: Retro Games that impressed us
01:19:10 - Our Year in Retro 2025: New Retro-Style Games
title: DF Retro Super Show #004: Our Year In Retro 2025
